/**
 * This model handles interactions with the module's "$TABLE$" table.
 *
 * @package     Nails
 * @subpackage  module-$MODULE$
 * @category    model
 * @author      Nails Dev Team <hello@nailsapp.co.uk>
 */

namespace Nails\$NAMESPACE$\Model;

use Nails\Common\Model\Base;

class $CLASS$ extends Base
{
    /**
     * $CLASS$ constructor.
     */
    public function __construct()
    {
        parent::__construct();
        $this->table = NAILS_DB_PREFIX . '$MODULE_PREFIX$_$TABLE$';
    }
}
